card.name: Abduction
card.text: Enchant creature When Abduction enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature. You control enchanted creature. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Abeyance
card.text: Until end of turn, target player can't cast instant or sorcery spells, and that player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities. Draw a card.

card.name: Abjure
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Abjure, sacrifice a blue permanent. Counter target spell.

card.name: Aboroth
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Put a -1/-1 counter on Aboroth.

card.name: Abyssal Gatekeeper
card.text: When Abyssal Gatekeeper dies, each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: AEther Flash
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, AEther Flash deals 2 damage to it.

card.name: Agonizing Memories
card.text: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.

card.name: Alabaster Dragon
card.text: Flying When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Alms
card.text: {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Ancestral Knowledge
Angelic Renewal
card.text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may sacrifice Angelic Renewal. If you do, return that card to the battlefield.

card.name: Apathy
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may discard a card at random. If he or she does, untap that creature.

card.name: Arctic Wolves
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} When Arctic Wolves enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Argivian Find
card.text: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Argivian Restoration
card.text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Aura of Silence
card.text: Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast. Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Avizoa
card.text: Flying {0}: Avizoa gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You skip your next untap step. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Barishi
card.text: When Barishi dies, exile Barishi, then shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Barrow Ghoul
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Barrow Ghoul unless you exile the top creature card of your graveyard.

card.name: Benalish Knight
card.text: Flash First strike

card.name: Benalish Missionary
card.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocked creature this turn.

card.name: Betrothed of Fire
card.text: Enchant creature Sacrifice an untapped creature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Sacrifice enchanted creature: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Bloodrock Cyclops
card.text: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Blossoming Wreath
card.text: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Bogardan Firefiend
card.text: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Boiling Blood
card.text: Target creature attacks this turn if able. Draw a card.

card.name: Bone Dancer
card.text: Whenever Bone Dancer attacks and isn't blocked, you may put the top creature card of defending player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. If you do, Bone Dancer assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Bosium Strip
card.text: {3}, {T}: Until end of turn, if the top card of your graveyard is an instant or sorcery card, you may cast that card. If a card cast this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Briar Shield
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice Briar Shield: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Bubble Matrix
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures.

card.name: Buried Alive
card.text: Search your library for up to three creature cards and put them into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Call of the Wild
card.text: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

card.name: Chimeric Sphere
card.text: {2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 2/1 Construct artifact creature with flying. {2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 3/2 Construct artifact creature without flying.

card.name: Choking Vines
card.text: Cast Choking Vines only during the declare blockers step. X target attacking creatures become blocked. Choking Vines deals 1 damage to each of those creatures.

card.name: Cinder Giant
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Cinder Giant deals 2 damage to each other creature you control.

card.name: Cinder Wall
card.text: Defender When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

card.name: Circling Vultures
card.text: Flying You may discard Circling Vultures any time you could cast an instant. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Circling Vultures unless you exile the top creature card of your graveyard.

card.name: Cloud Djinn
card.text: Flying Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Coils of the Medusa
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/-1. Sacrifice Coils of the Medusa: Destroy all non-Wall creatures blocking enchanted creature.

card.name: Cone of Flame
card.text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

card.name: Debt of Loyalty
card.text: Regenerate target creature. You gain control of that creature if it regenerates this way.

card.name: Dense Foliage
card.text: Creatures can't be the targets of spells.

card.name: Desperate Gambit
card.text: Choose a source you control and flip a coin. If you win the flip, the next time that source would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Dingus Staff
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, Dingus Staff deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Disrupt
card.text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card.

card.name: Doomsday
card.text: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Downdraft
card.text: {G}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. Sacrifice Downdraft: Downdraft deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Duskrider Falcon
card.text: Flying, protection from black

card.name: Dwarven Berserker
card.text: Whenever Dwarven Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Dwarven Thaumaturgist
card.text: {T}: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Empyrial Armor
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.

card.name: Ertai's Familiar
card.text: Phasing When Ertai's Familiar phases out or leaves the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. {U}: Until your next upkeep, Ertai's Familiar can't phase out.

card.name: Fallow Wurm
card.text: When Fallow Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

card.name: Familiar Ground
card.text: Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Fatal Blow
card.text: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Fervor
card.text: Creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Festering Evil
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Festering Evil deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. {B}{B}, Sacrifice Festering Evil: Festering Evil deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Fire Whip
card.text: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player." Sacrifice Fire Whip: Fire Whip deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Firestorm
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Firestorm, discard X cards. Firestorm deals X damage to each of X target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Fit of Rage
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Fledgling Djinn
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, Fledgling Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Flux
card.text: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards. Draw a card.

card.name: Fog Elemental
card.text: Flying When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

card.name: Foriysian Brigade
card.text: Foriysian Brigade can block an additional creature.

card.name: Fungus Elemental
card.text: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Put a +2/+2 counter on Fungus Elemental. Activate this ability only if Fungus Elemental entered the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Gaea's Blessing
card.text: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Gallowbraid
card.text: Trample Cumulative upkeep - Pay 1 life.

card.name: Gemstone Mine
card.text: Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it. {T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

card.name: Gerrard's Wisdom
card.text: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

card.name: Goblin Bomb
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a fuse counter on Goblin Bomb. If you lose the flip, remove a fuse counter from Goblin Bomb. Remove five fuse counters from Goblin Bomb, Sacrifice Goblin Bomb: Goblin Bomb deals 20 damage to target player.

card.name: Goblin Grenadiers
card.text: Whenever Goblin Grenadiers attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature and target land.

card.name: Goblin Vandal
card.text: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Guided Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Harvest Wurm
card.text: When Harvest Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Haunting Misery
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Haunting Misery, exile X creature cards from your graveyard. Haunting Misery deals X damage to target player.

card.name: Heart of Bogardan
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} When a player doesn't pay Heart of Bogardan's cumulative upkeep, Heart of Bogardan deals X damage to target player and each creature he or she controls, where X is twice the number of age counters on Heart of Bogardan minus 2.

card.name: Heat Stroke
card.text: At end of combat, destroy each creature that blocked or was blocked this turn.

card.name: Heavy Ballista
card.text: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Hidden Horror
card.text: When Hidden Horror enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

card.name: Hurloon Shaman
card.text: When Hurloon Shaman dies, each player sacrifices a land.

card.name: Infernal Tribute
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice a nontoken permanent: Draw a card.

card.name: Inner Sanctum
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Pay 2 life. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

card.name: Jabari's Banner
card.text: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains flanking until end of turn.

card.name: Jangling Automaton
card.text: Whenever Jangling Automaton attacks, untap all creatures defending player controls.

card.name: Kithkin Armor
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater. Sacrifice Kithkin Armor: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to enchanted creature this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Lava Hounds
card.text: Haste When Lava Hounds enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to you.

card.name: Lava Storm
card.text: Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature or Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each blocking creature.

card.name: Liege of the Hollows
card.text: When Liege of the Hollows dies, each player may pay any amount of mana. Then each player who paid mana this way puts that many 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Llanowar Behemoth
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Llanowar Druid
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Llanowar Druid: Untap all Forests.

card.name: Llanowar Sentinel
card.text: When Llanowar Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, search your library for a card named Llanowar Sentinel and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Lotus Vale
card.text: If Lotus Vale would enter the battlefield, sacrifice two untapped lands instead. If you do, put Lotus Vale onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.

card.name: Mana Chains
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep {1}."

card.name: Mana Web
card.text: Whenever a land an opponent controls is tapped for mana, tap all lands that player controls that could produce any type of mana that land could produce.

card.name: Manta Ray
card.text: Manta Ray can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Manta Ray can't be blocked except by blue creatures. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Manta Ray.

card.name: Maraxus of Keld
card.text: Maraxus of Keld's power and toughness are each equal to the number of untapped artifacts, creatures, and lands you control.

card.name: Master of Arms
card.text: First strike {1}{W}: Tap target creature blocking Master of Arms.

card.name: Merfolk Traders
card.text: When Merfolk Traders enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Mind Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

card.name: Mischievous Poltergeist
card.text: Flying Pay 1 life: Regenerate Mischievous Poltergeist.

card.name: Mistmoon Griffin
card.text: Flying When Mistmoon Griffin dies, exile Mistmoon Griffin, then return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Morinfen
card.text: Flying Cumulative upkeep - Pay 1 life.

card.name: Mwonvuli Ooze
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} Mwonvuli Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus twice the number of age counters on it.

card.name: Nature's Kiss
card.text: Enchant creature {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Nature's Resurgence
card.text: Each player draws a card for each creature card in his or her graveyard.

card.name: Necratog
card.text: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Necratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Noble Benefactor
card.text: When Noble Benefactor dies, each player may search his or her library for a card and put that card into his or her hand. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Null Rod
card.text: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

card.name: Odylic Wraith
card.text: Swampwalk Whenever Odylic Wraith deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Ophidian
card.text: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Orcish Settlers
card.text: {X}{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Orcish Settlers: Destroy X target lands.

card.name: Paradigm Shift
card.text: Exile all cards from your library. Then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Peacekeeper
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Peacekeeper unless you pay {1}{W}. Creatures can't attack.

card.name: Pendrell Mists
card.text: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."

card.name: Phantom Warrior
card.text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

card.name: Phantom Wings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Phyrexian Furnace
card.text: {T}: Exile the bottom card of target player's graveyard. {1}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Furnace: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Psychic Vortex
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Draw a card. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a land and discard your hand.

card.name: Relearn
card.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Revered Unicorn
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} When Revered Unicorn leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the number of age counters on it.

card.name: Roc Hatchling
card.text: Roc Hatchling enters the battlefield with four shell counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a shell counter from Roc Hatchling. As long as Roc Hatchling has no shell counters on it, it gets +3/+2 and has flying.

card.name: Rogue Elephant
card.text: When Rogue Elephant enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

card.name: Sage Owl
card.text: Flying When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Sawtooth Ogre
card.text: Whenever Sawtooth Ogre blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Sawtooth Ogre deals 1 damage to that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Scorched Ruins
card.text: If Scorched Ruins would enter the battlefield, sacrifice two untapped lands instead. If you do, put Scorched Ruins onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Serenity
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Serra's Blessing
card.text: Creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Serrated Biskelion
card.text: {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Shattered Crypt
card.text: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. You lose X life.

card.name: Soul Shepherd
card.text: {W}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Southern Paladin
card.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target red permanent.

card.name: Spinning Darkness
card.text: You may exile the top three black cards of your graveyard rather than pay Spinning Darkness's mana cost. Spinning Darkness deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Steel Golem
card.text: You can't cast creature spells.

card.name: Strands of Night
card.text: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Straw Golem
card.text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, sacrifice Straw Golem.

card.name: Striped Bears
card.text: When Striped Bears enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Sylvan Hierophant
card.text: When Sylvan Hierophant dies, exile Sylvan Hierophant, then return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Tariff
card.text: Each player sacrifices the creature he or she controls with the highest converted mana cost unless he or she pays that creature's mana cost. If two or more creatures a player controls are tied for highest cost, that player chooses one.

card.name: Teferi's Veil
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it phases out at end of combat.

card.name: Tendrils of Despair
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Tendrils of Despair, sacrifice a creature. Target opponent discards two cards.

card.name: Thran Forge
card.text: {2}: Until end of turn, target nonartifact creature gets +1/+0 and becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Thran Tome
card.text: {5}, {T}: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent chooses one of those cards. Put that card into your graveyard, then draw two cards.

card.name: Thunderbolt
card.text: Choose one - Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player; or Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Thundermare
card.text: Haste When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

card.name: Timid Drake
card.text: Flying When another creature enters the battlefield, return Timid Drake to its owner's hand.

card.name: Tolarian Entrancer
card.text: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer becomes blocked by a creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Tolarian Serpent
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Touchstone
card.text: {T}: Tap target artifact you don't control.

card.name: Tranquil Grove
card.text: {1}{G}{G}: Destroy all other enchantments.

card.name: Uktabi Efreet
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {G}

card.name: Urborg Justice
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Urborg Stalker
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls a nonblack, nonland permanent, Urborg Stalker deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Veteran Explorer
card.text: When Veteran Explorer dies, each player may search his or her library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Vitalize
card.text: Untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Vodalian Illusionist
card.text: {U}{U}, {T}: Target creature phases out.

card.name: Volunteer Reserves
card.text: Banding Cumulative upkeep {1}

card.name: Wave of Terror
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} At the beginning of your draw step, destroy each creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of age counters on Wave of Terror. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Well of Knowledge
card.text: {2}: Draw a card. Any player may activate this ability but only during his or her draw step.

card.name: Winding Canyons
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may play creature cards as though they had flash.

card.name: Xanthic Statue
card.text: {5}: Until end of turn, Xanthic Statue becomes an 8/8 Golem artifact creature with trample.

card.name: Zombie Scavengers
card.text: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Regenerate Zombie Scavengers.
